pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ü•¢ Curated TokenizersThis Python library provides word-/sentencepiece tokenizers. The followingtypes of tokenizers are currenty supported:| Tokenizer | Binding | Example model || --------- | ------------- | ------------- || BPE | sentencepiece | || Byte BPE | Native | RoBERTa/GPT-2 || Unigram | sentencepiece | XLM-RoBERTa || Wordpiece | Native | BERT |## ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: experimental packageThis package is experimental and it is likely that the APIs will change inincompatible ways.## ‚è≥ InstallCurated tokenizers is availble through PyPI:```bashpip install curated_tokenizers```## üöÄ QuickstartThe best way to get started with curated tokenizers is through the[`curated-transformers`](https://github.com/explosion/curated-transformers)library. `curated-transformers` also provides functionality to load tokenizationmodels from Huggingface Hub.
